All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class FilterTerm
extends VdrSearchTerm

This class represents a filter search term (or constraint) used within a VdrSearchExpression.

Field Detail

BY_LINE

public static final String BY_LINE
A reserved field attribute name for Filter by Line search. Must use this name as attribute name to create a FilterTerm object for filter by line search.

See Also:

                  ComparisonOperators op,

           throws ViewDirectException
A fileter search term with one value to compare

Parameters:
attributeName - - must be FilterTerm.BY_LINE for filter by line search
